headers.value: default-src 'self' *.nerdwallet.biz *nerdwallet.com; script-src 'self' *.nerdwallet.biz *nerdwallet.com 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; style-src 'self' *.nerdwallet.biz *nerdwallet.com 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' *.nerdwallet.biz *nerdwallet.com data:; font-src 'self' *.nerdwallet.biz *nerdwallet.com; connect-src 'self' *.nerdwallet.biz *nerdwallet.com; media-src 'self' *.nerdwallet.biz *nerdwallet.com; object-src 'self' *.nerdwallet.biz *nerdwallet.com; frame-src 'self' *.nerdwallet.biz *nerdwallet.com; sandbox allow-forms allow-same-origin allow-scripts; report-uri /csp-report
